subject: p13353878
History: COPD, hypertension, patient with history of PE, on Coumadin, with recent fevers.
Findings: Comparison is made with prior study,. Mild cardiomegaly is stable. Mild-to-moderate pulmonary edema is new. There has been interval worsening in left perihilar consolidation, most likely consistent with pneumonia. Continued followup is recommended until resolution. Small bilateral pleural effusions, left greater than right, have increased. There is no evident pneumothorax.
